hobbies.title: Keyboard
hobbies.description: Keyboard is an important part of my life. Recently I play 2000s punk/ rocks. I compose my own music too. I also love going to concerts to see my favorite bands!( ﾉ^ω^)ﾉ

hobbies.title: Cross stitc
hobbies.description: Crossstitch is a one of creative hobbies of mine because I love designing my own patterns with words!

hobbies.title: Crochet
hobbies.description: Crochet is my another hobby to keep my spare time busy. Also my cat Kiwi loves bothering me with my yarn and thread!
